comment: : Map locating the Paris offices of satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo
amr:
# ::snt : Map locating the Paris offices of satirical magazine Charlie Hebdo
(l / locate-01
      :ARG0 (m / map)
      :ARG1 (o / office
            :poss (m2 / magazine
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Charlie"
                        :op2 "Be Hebdo")
                  :mod (s / satire))
            :location (c / city
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Paris"))))

# ::snt Also check our interactive map
(c / check-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)

            :mod (ii / interactive)
            :poss (w / we))
      :mod (a / also))
